thread.title: Roy Jennen

author: Roy Jennen
title: Roy Jennen
text:
Renting a car in Iceland remains very expensive.
But, given the extreme road and weather conditions, you'd better not save on safety and pick the best 4x4 you can afford. At Geysir, I did not get the car that I had booked. Instead they offered me a free of charge upgrade. That enabled me to go onto F-roads without worrying if I would make it back.
When returning the car, staff was very friendly and efficient.
Highly recommended.
